fields.title: Fire & Gas Detection Network Installation
fields.description: Design and deploy a comprehensive F&G system across process units. Includes detector mapping, alarm rationalization workshops, and integration with Emergency Shutdown Systems (ESD).
fields.excerpt: Design and deploy a comprehensive F&G system across process units. Includes detector mapping, alarm rationalization workshops, and integration with Emergency Shutdown Systems (ESD).

fields.title: Emergency Drainage & Venting System Upgrade
fields.description: Redesign drainage and venting systems to handle worst-case scenarios. Includes dispersion modeling (PHAST or FLACS) and rerouting to safe locations
fields.excerpt: Redesign drainage and venting systems to handle worst-case scenarios. Includes dispersion modeling (PHAST or FLACS) and rerouting to safe locations

fields.title: Floating Roof Seal Replacement
fields.description: Replace worn seals on floating roof tanks to prevent vapor emissions and reduce fire risk. May include secondary seal installation and rim vent upgrades.
fields.excerpt: Replace worn seals on floating roof tanks to prevent vapor emissions and reduce fire risk. May include secondary seal installation and rim vent upgrades.

fields.title: Fine Chemicals Multipurpose Facility
fields.description: Design a flexible plant with interchangeable reactor skids, CIP systems, and batch automation to support rapid product changeovers
fields.excerpt: Design a flexible plant with interchangeable reactor skids, CIP systems, and batch automation to support rapid product changeovers

fields.title: Hazardous Waste Neutralization Unit
fields.description: Construct a dedicated unit for treating and neutralizing toxic byproducts from specialty chemical production. Includes scrubbers, incinerators, and real-time monitoring
fields.excerpt: Construct a dedicated unit for treating and neutralizing toxic byproducts from specialty chemical production. Includes scrubbers, incinerators, and real-time monitoring

fields.title: Waste-to-Fuel Co-processing Facility
fields.description: Design and construct a facility that processes industrial and municipal waste into alternative fuels for cement kilns
fields.excerpt: Design and construct a facility that processes industrial and municipal waste into alternative fuels for cement kilns

fields.title: Modular Carbon Capture & Utilization (CCU) Unit
fields.description: Install a modular CCU system to capture CO2 from cement production and convert it into useful products like aggregates or chemicals
fields.excerpt: Install a modular CCU system to capture CO2 from cement production and convert it into useful products like aggregates or chemicals
